body_html: @brando90 I've added some suggestions on the stackoverflow thread (remove queues, add session timeouts, use cpu-only binary, try to match env to reproduce locally, isolate exactly which line gets stuck). From the description it's not clear that there's anything wrong with tensorflow (ie, maybe it's stuck waiting for input)
